comment: based on lager book, called for c30 6% lager malt 54.55% munich 36.36% carapils 3.03% 1051-1013 11 srm 26 ibus 150 mash hallertau or perle at start of boil, 45 and 15,
last time i brewed this it dropped a lot of temp during the mash, try to hold longer this time.
double batch, making 10 gal, got c40 (no c30 available), using 2 packets or dry yeast for each 5 gal
1054 OG, long mash due to trip to dump, 162 strike, 1.5 qts per lb, 2 hr 45 min mash, 153 mash, finished at 149, 90 min boil, 10 gallons so doubled all
finished around 1012 for 5.5%, lagering one until fall, will be a good oktoberferst as well.
won BEST IN SHOW at 2015 AA county Fair!
